      • randomBytes

        public byte[] randomBytes(int size)
        Description copied from interface: ConfidentialStore
        Works like SecureRandom.nextBytes(byte[]).

        This enables implementations to consult other entropy sources, if it's available.

        Specified by:
        randomBytes in interface ConfidentialStore
